name.baseName: Paraxylene Production ; Paraxylene ; Naphtha Route ; Naphtha
对二甲苯生产 ; 对二甲苯 ; 石脑油路线 ; 石脑油

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The aromatics complex produces p-xylene and by-products such as raffinate, benzene, and heavy aromatics, including xylene fractionation units, adsorption separation units, isomerization units, disproportionation transalkylation units and aromatics extraction units.
芳烃联合装置生产对二甲苯，并副产抽余油、苯、重芳烃等产品，包括二甲苯分馏装置、吸附分离装置、异构化装置、歧化烷基转移装置和芳烃抽提装置。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: A functional unit is defined as 1 ton of p-xylene product

time.common:timeRepresentativenessDescription: Not mentioned, replaced by the publication time of the document
未提及，以文献发表时间代替

technology.technologicalApplicability: Paraxylene produced via the naphtha route in an aromatics complex is mainly used as a precursor for the manufacturing of polyethylene terephthalate (PET), which is a plastic material employed in both fibers for clothing and containers for liquids and foods. It can also be used in the production of dimethyl terephthalate (DMT), both of which are precursors to polyester production.
通过石脑油路线在芳烃联合装置中生产的对二甲苯主要用作聚对苯二甲酸乙二醇酯（PET）的前体，PET是一种塑料材料，用于制造服装纤维和存储液体及食品的容器。对二甲苯也可以用于生产二甲基对苯二甲酸（DMT），这两者都是聚酯生产的前体。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: For the material system whose evaluation products are mostly petroleum hydrocarbons, their physical properties and composition are similar, so the greenhouse gas emissions can be allocated according to the mass allocation method.
对于评价产品多为石油烃类的物质体系，其物性和组成相近，因此可按照质量分配法进行温室气体排放量分配。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: For the material system whose evaluation products are mostly petroleum hydrocarbons, their physical properties and composition are similar, so the greenhouse gas emissions can be allocated according to the mass allocation method.
对于评价产品多为石油烃类的物质体系，其物性和组成相近，因此可按照质量分配法进行温室气体排放量分配。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 田涛, 朱明璋, & 姜晔. 石化产品碳足迹评价研究与实践. 油气与新能源 34, 100–108 (2022).
田涛, 朱明璋, & 姜晔. 石化产品碳足迹评价研究与实践. 油气与新能源 34, 100–108 (2022).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this LCA dataset for paraxylene production should note that the functional unit is defined as 1 ton of p-xylene product. When applying this data, the greenhouse gas emissions should be allocated based upon mass allocation method due to the similarity in physical properties and composition amongst the petroleum hydrocarbon products. It is essential to consider the publication time of this document as the surrogate for missing carbon emission factors (LCI results) from the domestic refinery company. The dataset may primarily be relevant for life cycle inventory analyses of products where petrochemical hydrocarbons predominate.
使用此芳烃复合物对二甲苯生产的生命周期评估数据集的用户应注意，功能单位被定义为1吨对二甲苯产品。在应用这些数据时，由于石油烃类产品的物理性质和组成相似，应基于质量分配法进行温室气体排放量的分配。考虑到国内炼化企业缺少的碳排放因子（LCI结果），应使用本文档的发表时间作为替代。此数据集主要与以石油化工烃类为主的产品的生命周期清单分析相关。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
